column4: Hello, the Ubuntu install will not let me choose the disk that I want to install it. The disk it wants to install on is my second disk, how Do I install Ubuntu to the first disk, that has Gentoo on it?
:cousteau yes but it keeps taking me to sdb not sda that is my problem, and there is no option to do so.
:cousteau my setup is Gentoo on the first master disk and xp on the second slave one.
